We are excited to announce our June event taking place on the **17th of June**, from **3pm**. This month we are kindly hosted by Maths and Stats.

**Date:** 17th June, 3-5pm\
**Location:** Room 116, Maths and Stats Building\
**Talks:**

-   **Luciana Luque:** From zero to hero: An end-to-end computational pipeline for analysis of multiplexed images

-   **Joshua Roche:** Challenges in CT-Based Assessment of Pleural Mesothelioma

-   **Surajit Ray:** Tumour Segmentation for Lymphoma Using a Pre-trained U-Net model and Probability Contour Framework

Looking forward to seeing you all there,

The CompBio Team
